message.name: ERR_XRV_INTAKE_APPLICATION_TYPE_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Online Category as Online Applications exist on it.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCREENING_TYPE_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Online Category as Online Screenings exist on it.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: An Online Category with the same Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_NO_SCREENING_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one Online Screening must be selected.

message.name: ERR_NO_INTAKE_APPLICATION_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one Online Application must be selected.

message.name: ERR_FV_NEGATIVE_DISPLAY_ORDER_ENTERED
message.locale: The field 'Display Order' must not be a negative number.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The description field of this Online Category cannot be longer than %1s characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The description entered is too long (%1s), maximum allowed is %2s.
